headline: After Mardi Gras scheduling conflict, NFL bumps New Orleans Super Bowl from 2024 to 2025
summary: The NFL voted to move its Super Bowl LVIII event in 2024 to Las Vegas after the agreement with New Orleans conflicted with Mardi Gras due to the league's new regular-season schedule.
Amazon previously said it wouldn't ding warehouse workers if they took too many breaks as a coronavirus safety measure.
headline: Amazon has resumed policies that penalize workers for taking too many breaks, just in time for Prime Day
1 billion kids in developing nations may be out of school due to pandemic, says World Bank head
summary: "The learning goes backward. That's a particular problem in the developing world," according to David Malpass, president of the World Bank.
U.S. stock futures were flat on Wednesday night as traders continued to weigh the prospects for a coronavirus aid deal being reached.
headline: Stock futures are flat as Wall Street tries to recover from 2-day slide
Ahead of Walgreens earnings, two market analysts share whether it’s a buy
summary: Walgreens, the second-largest pharmacy chain in the U.S., is set to report earnings before the bell Thursday. Here's what to expect after the release.
Among Us is a multiplayer PC and mobile game that has suddenly exploded in popularity, becoming one of the hit video games of 2020.
headline: How Amazon's Twitch turned an obscure game called Among Us into a pandemic mega-hit

summary: As a new generation of investors flock to the stock market, criminals are looking for ways to exploit them by buying credentials on the dark web.
headline: Hackers look to buy brokerage log-ins on the dark web with Robinhood fetching highest prices

summary: The company said it now expects revenue of $70 million to $71 million, compared to its previous guidance of $73.5 million to $75.5 million.
headline: Fastly plunges more than 25% on lowered revenue guidance

summary: The coronavirus pandemic pushed United Airlines to a wider-than-expected third-quarter loss but the carrier was able to trim cash burn.
headline: United Airlines posts wider-than-expected loss in pandemic slump, cuts cash burn
Democrats raise at least $35 million during Amy Coney Barrett hearings
summary: Democrats have raised at least $35 million during Amy Coney Barrett's confirmation hearings.
Social Security checks will get a 1.3% boost next year to help beneficiaries keep up with the cost of living. Here's how much that will mean for your benefits.
headline: Here's how much your Social Security check will increase in 2021

summary: The NBA projected increased revenue for its jersey patches but with pandemic losses and a ratings decline, it could impact potential agreements.
headline: Despite ratings decline, NBA still sees a bright future for its $150 million patch sponsorship program
Apple unveiled a slew of new iPhones—here's what Cramer and others think of the stock
summary: Apple announced four new iPhone 12 models on Tuesday, all of which support new, faster 5G networks. Six experts break down how they view the new products and what it may mean for Apple's stock performance going forward.

headline: Virgin Galactic's next spaceflight test remains on track to launch in the coming weeks
summary: Space tourism venture Virgin Galactic on Wednesday confirmed to CNBC that it remains on track to conduct its next test spaceflight this fall.

YouTube will begin taking down videos that spread misinformation about vaccines to treat the coronavirus, the company said on Wednesday. The new policy applies to clips with content that contradicts "expert consensus" from local health authorities and the Wor…
headline: YouTube to pull clips questioning authorities on COVID vaccines

summary: YouTube said it’s working on new efforts to combat misinformation as it anticipates a forthcoming Covid-19 vaccine.
headline: YouTube preps for Covid-19 vaccine misinformation with new policies

summary: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Orbit looks bounce back its first demonstration launch failure in May, aiming to fly again in December.
headline: Branson's Virgin Orbit aims to redo launch demo in December, as it seeks $150 million in new capital
SoFi to make stock investing more like a Spotify playlist follow
summary: SoFi has grown accounts 250% as more millennial and Gen Z Americans invest through mobile. Now it's adding a stocks playlist feature and leaderboard so members can monitor trading activity of personal connections.

Facebook made the decision to limit the distribution of a news article from the New York Post that claims to show 'smoking gun' emails related to Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden and his son.
headline: Facebook makes editorial decision to limit distribution of story claiming to show 'smoking gun' emails related to Biden and his son

summary: Apple's decision to remove the charger and headphones from iPhone 12 boxes has been well received by environmentalists.
headline: Sustainability experts welcome Apple's move to scrap iPhone accessories, call for more action on e-waste
